content: Create a song in the key of C major.

Sure! Here's a song in the key of C major:

**Verse 1:**

(Am) When the morning (F) light breaks through,  
(C) I see the world (G) anew,  
(Am) Every shadow (F) fades away,  
(C) As the sun (G) begins to play.  

**Chorus:**

(C) Oh, life is a (G) melody,  
(Am) Dancing in the (F) breeze,  
(C) In the key of (G) C,  
(Am) Our hearts are (F) free.  

**Verse 2:**

(Am) Beneath the sky so (F) wide and blue,  
(C) Dreams are waiting, (G) just for you,  
(Am) Take a step and (F) feel the beat,  
(C) Let your spirit (G) find its feet.  

**Chorus:**

(C) Oh, life is a (G) melody,  
(Am) Dancing in the (F) breeze,  
(C) In the key of (G) C,  
(Am) Our hearts are (F) free.  

**Bridge:**

(F) Every note we (G) sing,  
(Am) Is a story (C) we bring,  
(F) Together we'll (G) find,  
(Am) A harmony so (C) kind.  

**Chorus:**

(C) Oh, life is a (G) melody,  
(Am) Dancing in the (F) breeze,  
(C) In the key of (G) C,  
(Am) Our hearts are (F) free.  

**Outro:**

(C) In the key of (G) C,  
(Am) Our hearts are (F) free,  
(C) In the key of (G) C,  
(Am) We find our (F) symphony.  

Feel free to add your own touches or change any part to suit your style!
